channel.title: Firecapescapee [508] My First [508] Server!
channel.description:
This Is My First [508] Server. And i have been a member of moparisthebest for 2 days now. I am planning this server paced of RockHardScape, But hopefully with more things on it. I am using RockHardScape source and i no you are probaly thinking i am leeching, but im not cause im devoloping on it. Just say that it is a advanced base. I will be adding the follow in green: God-Wars. (( done round about 70% )) Full Jad-Mini. (( not full only jad and keeping it that way )) Npc Training. (( Currently With Dummies )) A New Home. (( done )) More Commands (( Alot More )) I May Be Adding Pest Control. (( not started )) If I Get Shop Handeler They Will Be Shops. About 50% Mage (( Already Got Full Anceints )) All Specs Work. (( done )) Full Bounty Hunter. (( done )) Full Wildy. (( done )) ::Bank Is Currently Working. (( done )) All Prayer Working. (( done )) All SkillCapes Emotes Are Working. (( done )) Clan Chat. (( done ))
Here Are Some Pics.

Have you thought of adding a World changer or something… Just an Idea

item.description:
@firecapescapee wrote:

Thank you to every post. and thanks reaper lol.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2008, 11:18:43 am[/size][hr][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2008, 11:20:06 am[/size][hr]Alot Of Updates to server Using my mates computer having problems with mine compiler not Working will be getting pics of the updates.

stick around. and please post. thanks.

im doing it ones well twice there is only one more but i ant that one to be locked if you look at it i am sorry but i need to start my server again cause the one i had i lost all files to it and i dint have any backup files so there is no point doing all that devolpment again so im starting on something new.

This Is My First [508] Server.
And i have been a member of moparisthebest for 2 days now.
I am planning this server paced of RockHardScape, But hopefully with more things on it.
I am using RockHardScape source and i no you are probaly thinking i am leeching, but im not cause im devoloping on it. Just say that it is a advanced base.
